channel.title: UserForms on The CAD Coder
channel.description: Recent content in UserForms on The CAD Coder

item.title: VBA UserForms
item.description:
A UserForm is useful if your VBA macro needs to get information from a user.

For example, your macro may have some options that can be specified in a UserForm.

item.title: VBA Userforms - Open new Part document
item.description:
In this post, we learn how can we open a part document from a Visual Basic for Application’s Userform.

For this please we need to do following steps as described below.

item.title: VBA Userforms - Open new Assembly and Drawing document
item.description: In this post, we learn how can we Open new Assembly and Drawing document from a Visual Basic for Application’s Userform.

item.title: VBA Userforms - Testing Open new Assembly and Drawing document
item.description:
Introduction

In this post, we test our Open new Assembly and Drawing document code sample.

This post is supplement of VBA Userforms - Open new Assembly and Drawing document post.

item.title: VBA Userforms - Browse SOLIDWORKS file(s)
item.description:
Introduction

In this article, we learn how to browse SOLIDWORKS file(s) from a SOLIDWORKS VBA Userform.

In this article, I explain about 2 different methods which are listed below.
